    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
    Interface defining the contract for game board operations in the Tetris game.
    Brick
    Interface defining the contract for Tetris brick (tetromino) shapes.
    BrickGenerator
     
    BrickRotator
    Manages brick rotation using the Strategy design pattern.
    BrickRotatorTest
    Test suite for BrickRotator class.
    ClearRow
    Immutable data container representing the result of row clearing operations.
    ClearRowTest
    Test suite for ClearRow data container class.
    CollisionHandler
    Complete collision detection engine for the Tetris game.
    CollisionHandlerTest
    Test suite for CollisionHandler utility class.
    DownData
     
    EventSource
     
    EventType
     
    GameController
    Controller class that coordinates game logic and user input in the MVC architecture.
    GameOverPanel
     
    GuiController
    Controller for the JavaFX GUI in the Tetris game.
    HardDropResult
    Immutable data container representing the result of a hard drop operation.
    IBrick
    Defines the I-shaped tetromino (also known as the "I-piece" or "line piece").
    InputEventListener
     
    JBrick
    Defines the J-shaped tetromino (also known as the "J-piece").
    LBrick
    Defines the L-shaped tetromino (also known as the "L-piece").
    Main
     
    MatrixOperations
    Utility class providing matrix operations for the Tetris game board.
    MatrixOperationsTest
    Test suite for MatrixOperations utility class.
    MoveEvent
     
    MovementHandler
    Handles movement calculations for brick positions.
    NextShapeInfo
     
    NoRotationStrategy
    Rotation strategy that performs no rotation (returns the original matrix).
    NotificationPanel
     
    OBrick
    Defines the O-shaped tetromino (also known as the "O-piece" or "square piece").
    RandomBrickGenerator
     
    RotationStrategy
    Strategy interface for brick rotation algorithms in the Strategy design pattern.
    RowClearer
    Handles row-clearing logic for the Tetris game board.
    RowClearerTest
    Test suite for RowClearer utility class.
    SBrick
    Defines the S-shaped tetromino (also known as the "S-piece").
    Score
    Manages the game score, lines cleared, and high score using JavaFX properties for reactive UI binding.
    SimpleBoard
    Implementation of the game board logic for Tetris.
    SimpleBoardTest
    Test suite for SimpleBoard class.
    SimpleBoardTest.TestBrickGenerator
    Test brick generator that provides deterministic bricks for testing.
    StandardRotationStrategy
    Standard rotation strategy that rotates shapes 90 degrees clockwise.
    TBrick
    Defines the T-shaped tetromino (also known as the "T-piece").
    TestBrick
    Test brick implementation for deterministic testing.
    ViewData
    Immutable data transfer object containing view information for rendering the game state.
    ViewDataTest
    Test suite for ViewData class.
    ZBrick
    Defines the Z-shaped tetromino (also known as the "Z-piece").
